entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide full `updateTypes` to MetadataUpdateHandlers #52937
  • Perf regression: plaintext #52936
  • Implement WebAssembly (WASM) Support for Improved Frontend Performance #52934
  • Does [AsParameters] properly propagate documentation via ApiExplorer? #52931
  • [Feature] Generate multiple Razor Pages css isolation bundles #52927
  • InteractiveServer with prerender incorrectly waits for the completion of OnInitializedAsync #52926
  • C# try catch is not working, application crashes after exception #52925
  • Perf regression: json #52924
  • Proposal for UI-Driven Type Refactoring Tool Using Tag #52922
  • AuthorizeView non-functional with InteractiveServer and Windows (Negotiate) Auth #52921
  • Blazor component AuthorizeView can accept the AuthorizationPolicy combine function result. #52920
  • Support for Blazor Events in Blazor SSR. #52919

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52870
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #52923
  • NET8: DefaultObjectPool<T>.Get() method returns null under multi-threads, seems not thread-safe with NET8 and throws exception, while no problem with NET7 #52873
  • Bring back stateful prerendering #46401
    Planning: WebUI
  • Split blazor.web.js into dynamically-loadable bundles #48771
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Improved model for preserving persistent component state #46995
    Planning: WebUI
  • Circular references are not supported, take two #20525
    Planning: WebUI
  • Allow JSON-LD Scripts (error RZ9992: Script tags should not be placed inside components) #37230
    Planning: WebUI
  • Log a warning if event callbacks are registered on non-interactive components #50047
    Planning: WebUI
  • Inject CMS Content to Razor Components at compile time #50817
    Planning: WebUI
  • RazorComponentResult returned component cannot execute clientside code #50762
    Planning: WebUI
  • Map Razor Components collides with MapFallbackToPage #50816
    Planning: WebUI
  • Unclear error when incompatible JavaScript included on page (but works in SSR) #51010
    Planning: WebUI
  • [.NET 8] Page Title not being applied when using WebAssembly PreRender=false #52090
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor: Can `NavigateTo` and `href=` be used without interfering with each other? #52705
  • EventCallbackFactory has wrong nullability annotations for all callback parameters. #52872
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50220
  • Perf regression: json, json #52883
  • Blazor hosted wasm dependent assembly loading issue in 7.0.9 #49685
    Planning: WebUI
  • ANCM crashes with shadow copy enabled and the new deployment deleted a directory #48233
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor Form Validation Input elements initially rendered with class valid #27113
    .NET 9 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    area-networking
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Revert "Disable source index build step (#51710)" #52933
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix shadow copy up to date check on startup #52831
    feature-iis, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid setting incompatible default value for StringValue sources #52895
    feature-rdg, area-networking
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Test failure] Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.WrongApplicationPath_FailedToRun #52890
    area-networking
  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, area-networking, 6.0.x
